game.name: Football Story
game.genres: 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 시뮬레이션, 스포츠
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Life in the neighborhood awaits! As a local pro team cheekily announces a match against best of the non pro, Rad and his future friends decide to thwart their confidence, while meeting all sorts of dorky situations one could ever imagine! Train, play and live in Football Story!
